title: Physiologically based pharmacokinetic (PBPK) model of chlorzoxazone

creators.affiliation: Humboldt-University Berlin, Institute for Theoretical Biology, Berlin
creators.name: Küttner, Jonas

creators.affiliation: Humboldt-University Berlin, Institute for Theoretical Biology, Berlin

description:
This repository provides the chlorzoxazone physiologically based pharmacokinetic (PBPK) model.

If you have any questions or problems please open an issue

Funding

Matthias König were supported by the Federal Ministry of Education and Research (BMBF, Germany) within the research network Systems Medicine of the Liver (LiSyM, grant number 031L0054) and by the German Research Foundation (DFG) within the Research Unit Programme FOR 5151 QuaLiPerF (Quantifying Liver Perfusion-Function Relationship in Complex Resection - A Systems Medicine Approach)" by grant number 436883643.
